casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Cross-Petitioner,
v.
Joseph BUNDY, Jr., a/k/a Joseph Bundy, Defendant-Cross-Respondent. C-473 September Term 2017
079747 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 12, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A cross-petition for certification of the judgment in A-003222-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the cross-petition for certification is denied.
